name: Burger Time (Spicy Chicken)
description:
Play as a chef at a renowned burger joint. Stack layers of cheese, lettuce and meat patties to make your burgers. Use the grills to cook the meat. Serve the hungry customers. Dodge rolling barrels. Make enough money. Get ready for Burger Time.

Controls:

Move/Interact - WASD/Arrow keys 

Made for Lowrez Jam 2021.
